dcterms:creator: DARPA
dcterms:description: The DARPA OpTC dataset consists of network and host logging collected from a network of hundreds of Windows hosts over a one-week period, representing normal user activity. It includes detailed descriptions of red team activities, providing a realistic scenario for testing cyber activity detection tasks.
dcterms:title: DARPA Operationally Transparent Computing (OpTC) dataset

dcterms:creator: MITRE
dcterms:description: The ECAR format is an extension of MITRE's Cyber Analytics Repository format, consisting of nested JSON dictionaries that describe various objects and actions taken on those objects, providing a structured way to log cyber activities.
dcterms:title: ECAR (Extended Cyber Analytic Repository) format

dcterms:creator: N. Moustafa
J. Slay
dcterms:description: The UNSW-NB15 dataset is a comprehensive dataset for network intrusion detection systems, providing a variety of synthetic data to enhance the detection of malicious cyber activities.
dcterms:title: UNSW-NB15 dataset

dcterms:creator: Fucheng Liu
Yu Wen
Dongxue Zhang
Xihe Jiang
Xinyu Xing
Dan Meng
dcterms:description: The Log2vec dataset utilizes a heterogeneous graph embedding approach to detect cyber threats within enterprise environments, focusing on the representation of log entries as nodes in a graph.
dcterms:title: Log2vec dataset
